page.title: 20WARBOYS SCHOOL AND LIBRARY
page.content: {Warboys School}is a Primary School.The junior part of the school is in the shape of an L.It has open plan classes that have a blackboard in each bay. There are six junior classes but one of the classes is in a mobile classroom.Children from Oldhurst and Woodhurst, as well as Warboys come to the school.The infant part has five classes with two classes in mobiles.We have a lot of sports facilities.There is a swimming pool which is quite large but also quite shallow. We have some apparatus for when it is wet and we have to go in the hall.In the summer we go out and play sports and athletics. The library is on the High Street. It is open 5 days a week. There are non- fiction and fiction books. About 50 books are taken out a day.
